backend/main.mo: Defines salon, booking, and user profile types with authorization, in-memory maps, and a seeding routine for default salons.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor data to the new format by adding missing fields like dates, premium fields, services, and loyalty info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with confidence and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each major frontend file and component.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode colors and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component handling authentication, profile loading, and routing to client or pro dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Header with branding, user-type badge, notifications icon, and logout logic.
Empty placeholder file for salon creation form logic.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Component displaying loyalty tier, XP, and progress calculations with tier-specific styling.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Toggle component that switches UI styling between normal and monopoly mode with an animated switch.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Renders a small amber-colored Premium badge with a crown icon.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that prompts the user to set name and role, then saves their profile using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Multi-step form for creating a salon, collecting details, services, premium status, and submitting via createSalon.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Displays a weekly revenue area chart using Recharts with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Fetches and displays salons with categories, a featured premium salon, and a recommended list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, salons, and booking, connecting them to the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode overrides, and scrollbar-hiding utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Implements the client dashboard with tab navigation, salon list, bookings placeholder, and user profile display.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a styled login screen integrating Internet Identity authentication with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Implements the professional dashboard with revenue widgets, team list, salon creation wizard, and tabbed views.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed salon info with service selection, date/slot picking, premium display, and booking flow.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended theme utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing the full-stack MVP scope, IC/Motoko backend architecture, frontend behavior requirements, known issues, and the list of implemented features with versioning.
